sentences.english: Silver-coated carbonyl iron powder was prepared by using electroless plating method.
sentences.chinese: 用化学镀法，甲醛为还原剂，制备镀银羰基铁粉。

sentences.english: Silver-plated copper center conductor for smooth, detailed sound production.
sentences.chinese: 镀银中心铜导体的顺利，详细的生产。

sentences.english: We never encounter such phenomena in silvering process.
sentences.chinese: 我们镀银时从未遇过这种现象。

sentences.english: Objective To test the anti-virus effect of inner silvered fiber and the influencing factors.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究内镀银纤维抗病毒性能及其影响因素。

sentences.english: I guess that the temperature of reaction may affect very much the silvering process.
sentences.chinese: 我估计反应的温度对镀银的过程有很大的影响。

sentences.english: CAB Signal Banana, non magnetic, eutectic brass, Rhodium over silver plate.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉插，无磁性结晶黄铜，镀银上镀铑。

sentences.english: Denis Wick offers silver-plated and gold-plated mouthpieces.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼斯维克提供镀银和镀金的号嘴。

sentences.english: Silver plate. Thick Brass nut, Gold plate.
sentences.chinese: 黄铜镀金，镀银上镀铑，厚螺母，信号插座。

sentences.english: Is one kind mixes has plates with silver the Sui particle squeezes out continuously the silica gel.
sentences.chinese: 是一种掺有镀银隋性微粒的连续挤出型的硅橡胶。

sentences.english: He wanted to plate copper with silver.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉插，纯黄铜镀金，镀银上镀铑。

sentences.english: One 120 cable terminating hole with set screw.
sentences.chinese: 研磨红铜叉，镀银上镀铑，120线孔，螺丝锁紧。

sentences.english: A newly developed electroless Ag plating technology for Cu and its alloys is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种在铜及其合金表面进行化学镀银的新工艺。

sentences.english: The hazard of waste water from silvering blanks of vacuum bottles as well as its sources were described.
sentences.chinese: 叙述了保温瓶胆镀银废水的来源及其危害。

sentences.english: State troopers awarded Buddy with a silver-plated bowl and a bone on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 上周五，州警奖励了这条狗一个镀银的碗和一根骨头。

sentences.english: Others struck in silver-plated base metal will cost much less.
sentences.chinese: 其他只是镀银的将比较便宜。

sentences.english: Rhodium over silver plate. Brass nut, Gold plate.
sentences.chinese: 黄铜镀金，镀银上镀铑，厚螺母，信号插座。

definition: brass (alloy of copper 銅|铜[tong2] and zinc 鋅|锌[xin1])
the coating of sth that has been chrome-plated or copper-plated etc
copper (pure copper, as opposed to alloy)
to gold-plate/to gild/(fig.) to make sth quite ordinary seem special
to gild/(old) wages paid to a performer or a troupe by a theater
